5.title: Business & Entrepreneurship
5.goal: Understand how successful companies are built and scaled, and how to think like an entrepreneur.

books.title: Good to Great
books.author: Jim Collins
books.summary: Explores why some companies transition from good to great and how they sustain superior performance.

books.title: The Lean Startup
books.author: Eric Ries
books.summary: A scientific approach to creating and managing successful startups through build-measure-learn cycles.

books.title: Zero to One
books.author: Peter Thiel
books.summary: Explores how to create truly innovative businesses and the importance of bold, original thinking.

5.title: Psychology & Human Behavior
5.goal: Gain insights into human decision-making, behavior, and habits to improve personal and professional outcomes.

books.title: Thinking, Fast and Slow
books.author: Daniel Kahneman
books.summary: Examines two modes of thought—fast, intuitive thinking and slow, deliberate reasoning—and their impact on decision-making.

books.title: Influence: The Psychology of Persuasion
books.author: Robert Cialdini
books.summary: Outlines six universal principles of persuasion and how they can be applied in everyday life.

books.title: Atomic Habits
books.author: James Clear
books.summary: Demonstrates how small, consistent changes in habits lead to remarkable results over time.

5.title: Physical Fitness & Health
5.goal: Develop physical strength, endurance, and healthier lifestyle habits.

books.title: Bigger Leaner Stronger
books.author: Michael Matthews
books.summary: A practical guide to building muscle, losing fat, and getting healthy through evidence-based fitness.

books.title: Born to Run
books.author: Christopher McDougall
books.summary: Tells the story of ultra-runners and the secrets of endurance from the Tarahumara tribe in Mexico.

books.title: The New Rules of Lifting
books.author: Lou Schuler & Alwyn Cosgrove
books.summary: Provides structured strength training programs and nutritional advice for sustainable fitness.

5.title: Personal Finance & Wealth
5.goal: Build financial literacy, develop investing skills, and achieve long-term wealth.

books.title: Rich Dad Poor Dad
books.author: Robert Kiyosaki
books.summary: Contrasts two approaches to money and investing, advocating financial education for wealth building.

books.title: The Intelligent Investor
books.author: Benjamin Graham
books.summary: The classic guide to value investing and long-term financial security.

books.title: Your Money or Your Life
books.author: Vicki Robin
books.summary: Focuses on transforming your relationship with money to achieve financial independence.

5.title: Self-Improvement & Motivation
5.goal: Strengthen personal discipline, resilience, and mindfulness for personal growth.

books.title: The 7 Habits of Highly Effective People
books.author: Stephen R. Covey
books.summary: A framework for personal effectiveness through timeless habits and principles.

books.title: Can’t Hurt Me
books.author: David Goggins
books.summary: A memoir of mental toughness, resilience, and breaking past self-imposed limits.

books.title: The Power of Now
books.author: Eckhart Tolle
books.summary: A spiritual guide to mindfulness and living fully in the present moment.

5.title: Leadership & Management
5.goal: Learn how to inspire, manage, and drive teams effectively.

books.title: Leaders Eat Last
books.author: Simon Sinek
books.summary: Explains how great leaders build trust and prioritize the well-being of their teams.

books.title: The Five Dysfunctions of a Team
books.author: Patrick Lencioni
books.summary: A leadership fable highlighting common dysfunctions in teams and strategies to overcome them.

books.title: Drive
books.author: Daniel H. Pink
books.summary: Reveals the surprising truth about what motivates people—autonomy, mastery, and purpose.

5.title: Philosophy & Wisdom
5.goal: Develop deeper wisdom, ethical reasoning, and life perspective.

books.title: Meditations
books.author: Marcus Aurelius
books.summary: Personal reflections on Stoic philosophy and practical wisdom for life.

books.title: The Republic
books.author: Plato
books.summary: A foundational philosophical work on justice, politics, and the ideal state.

books.title: The Courage to Be Disliked
books.author: Ichiro Kishimi & Fumitake Koga
books.summary: Explains Adlerian psychology in an accessible dialogue, focusing on self-acceptance and freedom.
